title: GET_WEAPON_ANIMATION_OVERRIDE
content:
0x63ED2E7// GetWeaponAnimationOverride
Hash GET_WEAPON_ANIMATION_OVERRIDE(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target ped.Returns: The weapon animation override.A getter for SET_WEAPON_ANIMATION_OVERRIDE.Examples:Lualocal weaponAnimation = GetWeaponAnimationOverride(PlayerPedId())
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_WEAPON_ANIMATION_OVERRIDE
GetWeaponAnimationOverride(ped)
